name: PonGlow
description:
PonGlow is a fast paced ping pong game where you need to survive a challenging arcade mode stacking up as many points as possible. PonGlow has a randomised level maker so you will never get the same game twice!

Features

-Randomised level generator.
-Progressive difficulty.
-Stat tracking to let you know how many block you hit and more.
-Fast paced action from start to finish
-Unlock new blocks and more from levelling up
-Compete to get the highest score
